item.title: 在linux下对NTFS进行读写
item.description:
今天发现了一个软件包叫ntfs-config

This program allow you to easily configure all of your NTFS devices to allow write support via a friendly gui. For that use, it will configure them to use the open source ntfs-3g driver. You’ll also be able to easily disable this feature. Homepage : http://givre.cabspace.com/ntfs-config

Homepage of ntfs-3g : http://www.ntfs-3g.org
